metadata.dc:title: Dataset for "Enter the Pragmatic Engineer: Ling Hongxun at Jiaotong University, 1920–1927"
metadata.dc:creator: Thorben Pelzer
metadata.dc:subject: Higher Education, Engineering Education, China, History of Science
metadata.dc:description: This dataset accompanies the article "Enter the Pragmatic Engineer: Ling Hongxun at Jiaotong University, 1920–1927" by Thorben Pelzer published in History of Education. It includes replication data and supplemental geospatial data used in the research.
metadata.dc:relation: Replication data and geospatial data for Nanyang University campus visualization
